# TCControlContents.ButtonShape

**Enumeration**

Defines the visual shape of a button.

## Declaration

```swift
enum ButtonShape
```

## Shapes

- **TCControlContents.ButtonShape.circle**: A circular button shape.
- **TCControlContents.ButtonShape.rect**: A rectangular button shape.

## Creating a button shape

- **init(rawValue:)**

## System content

- **TCControlContents.DpadDirection**: Defines the direction of a direction pad visual.
- **TCControlContents.DpadElementStyle**: Defines the visual style of the individual up/down/left/right elements of a direction pad.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
